item.title: Urgent~removing random drops~adding real drops
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

hey everyone, i have been trying to get this for weeks now, i have finally removed random drops and im trying to get the real drops working. i have all of it right except for this one error when i compile. please help me!!! this is the code - dropPvpItems(opp, allItems);

and this is the error in comipling - cannot find symbol in this -

if (receivesPVPRewards(this, opponent)) { dropPvpItems(opp, allItems);

any help would be greatly appreciated, this is the last thing i need to get done on my server

Read full topic
